definition: to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile
(publishing) layout and graphics/graphic design/art editor/graphic designer

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享頁面時，您可以將用戶指定爲查看者或編輯者。

sentences.english: Dr Kraabel began as an editor with the Edanz Group in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 2008年開始爲理文編輯工作，擔任編輯。

sentences.english: Dr Kraabel began as an editor with the Edanz Group in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 2008年開始爲理文編輯工作，擔任編輯。

sentences.english: When finished with the list, click OK then close out of Local Group Policy Editor.
sentences.chinese: 完成列表後，點擊確定並關閉本地組策略編輯器。

sentences.english: When the article arrived, the editor read the first sentence and then refused to publish it.
sentences.chinese: 稿子寄來後，編輯看第一句話就拒絕予以發表。

sentences.english: They also can be able to re-edit the post even after posting it.
sentences.chinese: 他們還可以能夠重新編輯，即使它張貼的職位。

sentences.english: Ensure compliance to Crowne Plaza Keys mandatories and implementation of new standards.
sentences.chinese: 確保編輯皇冠假日主要條款並執行新標準。

sentences.english: According to informed sources, "the Deputy Editor-in-Chief" is an administrative level.
sentences.chinese: 據知情人士說，“副總編輯”是一個行政級別。

sentences.english: I finished my job about editing the contest question about biology today.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我已經完成關於生物競賽題的編輯整理工作。

sentences.english: An easy to use collaborative environment for editing and running features. There is already RubyMine and LowDown, but I have some different ideas myself.
sentences.chinese: 提供易於使用的協助環境來編輯和運行相關功能。

sentences.english: Edit text, colors, styling, and layout using the new tablet UI look.
sentences.chinese: 編輯文本，色彩，造型和佈局使用新的UI看片。

sentences.english: Finally, find out who the editor is.
sentences.chinese: 最後，還應想到編輯是誰？

sentences.english: A typical example would be colors used for syntax highlighting with an editor.
sentences.chinese: 一個典型示例是用顏色來突出顯示編輯器中的語法。

sentences.english: Fixed not being able to escape from map editor menus after applying options.
sentences.chinese: 固定不能夠逃脫地圖編輯器菜單後應用選項。

sentences.english: He is also a contributing editor to The National Interest.
sentences.chinese: 他也是一名《國家利益》特約編輯。

definition: to take a photograph/photography/to shoot (a movie)
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to plot/to scheme/to bring about/to engineer/planning/producer/planner
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
